errors.message: Commit message does not follow Conventional Commits format
errors.fix:
Use format: type(scope): description
Allowed types: feat, fix, refactor, docs, test, chore, ci, perf, style, build
examples: fix(pg-non-prod): correct API key environment variable mappings
docs: update README with new workflow
